= jQAssistant User Manual
jQAssistant <info@jqassistant.org> @jqassistant

image::jQA_logo.png[]



*Your Software. Your Structures. Your Rules.*

This document describes the concepts of jQAssistant and usage information. To download jQAssistant, go to https://jqassistant.org/get-started/[*Get Started*].
